mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, m.* from (select company_no, company_category, company_name, company_tel, company_addr, company_info, company_thumb, start_time, end_time, company_enroll_date, day_off, company_report, company_state from company where company_state=1 order by company_name)m) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update company set company_state=2 where company_no=#{companyNo}

update company set
company_tel = #{companyTel}, company_addr = #{companyAddr}, company_info = #{companyInfo},
company_thumb = #{companyThumb},
start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, day_off = #{dayOff} where company_no = #{companyNo}
update company_keyword set keyword = #{keyWord} where company_no =#{companyNo}
mapper.select: select company_category from company where company_no = #{companyNo}
